numberOfCopy.title: PieceCIDs distribution by number of active replicas

awaitingPublished.title: Awaiting publish
awaitingPublished.tooltip: Deals that have been accepted by service providers (SPs) but are not yet published. Only taking into account SPs using CIDgravity.

sealing.title: Under sealing
sealing.tooltip: Deals that have been published on chain but are not currently active. This applies to all deals processed, regardless of whether CIDgravity is utilized.

active.title: Onboarded
active.tooltip: Data successfully processed and stored by service providers (SPs). This applies to any deals processed, whether utilizing CIDgravity or not.

remainingDatacapNotLocked.title: Remaining Datacap not locked
remainingDatacapNotLocked.tooltip: The On-chain Datacap minus the Datacap currently allocated to pending deals awaiting publish.

publishedExpired.title: Published expired
publishedExpired.tooltip: Deals that failed during the sealing stage.

slashed.title: Slashed
slashed.tooltip: Data that has been lost or removed by the Service Provider (SP).

expired.title: Expired
expired.tooltip: Data related to deals that have expired within the chosen time range.

noMoreCopies.title: Data lost
noMoreCopies.tooltip: PieceCID where the latest copy has been lost, either through removal or expiration, within the specified time range.

onboardedVolumeUnique.title: Onboarded volume unique PieceCID
onboardedVolumeUnique.tooltip: Unique data successfully onboarded during the specified time range.

onboardedVolumeReplicas.title: Onboarded volume with replicas
onboardedVolumeReplicas.tooltip: The aggregated data volume successfully onboarded, considering all replicas, throughout the specified time range.

offChainProviderStats.title: Additional statistics for providers utilizing CIDgravity.
